attributes.action: Improve maternity and paternity leave support for working families
attributes.additional_details: The government have the power to change legislation on a larger scale, ensuring this is fairly provided across the UK. It reduces it being specific to individual companies, it can be widespread legislation to support all working families who are not considered due to their incomes. With the ever increasing cost living, households need two wages. Maternity is not enough to cover the mothers wage, and paternity is not enough for fathers to efficiently bond with their new born child.
attributes.background: Increase the financial support to working families during maternity. The current financial support takes many families only to four months and father two weeks off to bond with their children. Both mothers and fathers forced back to work too soon.

rejection.details:
We understand that you want to see a change to the financial support for families during maternity and paternity leave, but we're not exactly sure what you'd like the change to be. 

You may wish to sign one of these petitions which are currently open: 

Increase Statutory Maternity Pay to 9 months at full pay: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653989

Change Statutory Maternity Pay to a percentage of weekly earnings with no cap: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/657524

Increase statutory maternity leave and pay to 2 years at 75% pay: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/657421

Extend Sure Start Maternity Grant and Healthy Start to all working mothers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/657852

If you want the Government to change entitlements to maternity and paternity pay and leave in a different way to the above petitions, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
